verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-and; יְדִיתוּן ye-di-tun כיְדוּת֗וּן <S%H3038><s%> ye-du-Tun, Jeduthun קלְאָסָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> le-'a-Saf of Asaph מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor. A Psalm קוֹלִ֣י <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him unto God וְאֶצְעָ֑קָה <S%H6817><s%> ve-'etz-'A-kah; I cried קוֹלִ֥י <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, [even] unto God וְהַאֲזִ֥ין <S%H238><s%> ve-ha-'a-Zin and he gave ear אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. in

בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom In the day צָרָתִי֮ <S%H6869><s%> tza-ra-Ti of my trouble אֲדֹנָ֪י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord דָּ֫רָ֥שְׁתִּי <S%H1875><s%> da-Ra-she-ti I sought יָדִ֤י׀ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di my sore לַ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah in the night נִ֭גְּרָה <S%H5064><s%> Nig-ge-rah ran וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo without תָפ֑וּג <S%H6313><s%> ta-Fug; and ceased מֵאֲנָ֖ה <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nah refused הִנָּחֵ֣ם <S%H5162><s%> hin-na-Chem to be comforted נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. not my soul

אֶזְכְּרָ֣ה <S%H2142><s%> 'ez-ke-Rah I remembered אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God וְאֶֽהֱמָיָ֑ה <S%H1993><s%> ve-'e-he-ma-Yah; and was troubled אָשִׂ֓יחָה׀ <S%H7878><s%> 'a-Si-chah I complained וְתִתְעַטֵּ֖ף <S%H5848><s%> ve-tit-'at-Tef was overwhelmed רוּחִ֣י <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chi and my spirit סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אָ֭חַזְתָּ <S%H270><s%> 'A-chaz-ta Thou holdest שְׁמֻר֣וֹת <S%H8109><s%> she-mu-Rot waking עֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai; mine eyes נִ֝פְעַ֗מְתִּי <S%H6470><s%> nif-'Am-ti, I am so troubled וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo cannot אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> 'a-dab-Ber. that I cannot speak

חִשַּׁ֣בְתִּי <S%H2803><s%> chish-Shav-ti I have considered יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim the days מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem; of old שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <S%H8141><s%> Not, the years עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-la-Mim. of ancient times

אֶֽזְכְּרָ֥ה <S%H2142><s%> 'ez-ke-Rah I call to remembrance נְגִינָתִ֗י <S%H5058><s%> ne-gi-na-Ti, my song בַּ֫לָּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> bal-La-ye-lah in the night עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with לְבָבִ֥י <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vi with mine own heart אָשִׂ֑יחָה <S%H7878><s%> 'a-Si-chah; I commune וַיְחַפֵּ֥שׂ <S%H2664><s%> vay-chap-Pes made diligent search רוּחִֽי׃ <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chi. and my spirit

הַֽ֭לְעוֹלָמִים <S%H5769><s%> Hal-'o-la-mim alway יִזְנַ֥ח׀ <S%H2186><s%> yiz-Nach cast off אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai; Will the Lord וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יֹסִ֖יף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sif add לִרְצ֣וֹת <S%H7521><s%> lir-Tzot he be favourable עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> od. again

הֶאָפֵ֣ס <S%H656><s%> he-'a-Fes clean gone לָנֶ֣צַח <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach alway חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do; Is his mercy גָּ֥מַר <S%H1584><s%> Ga-mar fail אֹ֝֗מֶר <S%H562><s%> 'O-mer, promise לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor age וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor. age

הֲשָׁכַ֣ח <S%H7911><s%> ha-sha-Chach forgotten חַנּ֣וֹת <S%H2589><s%> chan-Not to be gracious אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; Hath God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Or קָפַ֥ץ <S%H7092><s%> ka-Fatz shut up בְּ֝אַ֗ף <S%H639><s%> be-'Af, ;hath he in anger רַחֲמָ֥יו <S%H7356><s%> ra-cha-Mav tender love סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

וָ֭אֹמַר <S%H559><s%> Va-'o-mar And I said חַלּ֣וֹתִי <S%H2470><s%> chal-Lo-ti This [is] my infirmity הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> Hi; I שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <S%H8141><s%> Not, [but I will remember] the years יְמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> ye-Min of the right hand עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon. of the most High

אַזְכִּיר 'az-kir כאֶזְכֹּ֥ור <S%H2142><s%> 'ez-Kor shall remember קמַֽעַלְלֵי־ <S%H4611><s%> ma-'al-lei- the works יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> Yah; of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Surely אֶזְכְּרָ֖ה <S%H2142><s%> 'ez-ke-Rah surely I will remember מִקֶּ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem of old פִּלְאֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6382><s%> pil-'E-cha. thy wonders

וְהָגִ֥יתִי <S%H1897><s%> ve-ha-Gi-ti I will meditate בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol- all פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6467><s%> po-'o-Le-cha; also of all thy work וּֽבַעֲלִ֖ילוֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H5949><s%> u-va-'a-Li-lo-Tei-cha of thy doings אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ <S%H7878><s%> 'a-Si-chah. and talk

אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> bak-Ko-desh [is] in the sanctuary דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ke-cha; Thy way מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- What אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> 'el a God גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, who [is so] great כֵּֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> Ke-lo-Him. God

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You הָ֭אֵל <S%H410><s%> Ha-'el Thou [art] the God עֹ֣שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'O-seh that doest פֶ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> Fe-le; wonders הוֹדַ֖עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ho-Da'-ta thou hast declared בָעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> va-'am-Mim among the people עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Ze-cha. thy strength

גָּאַ֣לְתָּ <S%H1350><s%> ga-'Al-ta redeemed בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> biz-Ro-a' Thou hast with [thine] arm עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha; thy people בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the sons יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob וְיוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> ve-yo-Sef and Joseph סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

רָ֘א֤וּךָ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U-cha saw מַּ֨יִם׀ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim The waters אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, thee O God רָא֣וּךָ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U-cha saw מַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim the waters יָחִ֑ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> ya-Chi-lu; thee they were afraid אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> 'Af, also יִרְגְּז֥וּ <S%H7264><s%> yir-ge-Zu also were troubled תְהֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8415><s%> te-ho-Mot. the depths

זֹ֤רְמוּ <S%H2229><s%> Zo-re-mu poured out מַ֨יִם׀ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim water עָב֗וֹת <S%H5645><s%> a-Vot, The clouds ק֭וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol a sound נָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu sent out שְׁחָקִ֑ים <S%H7834><s%> she-cha-Kim; the skies אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- yet חֲ֝צָצֶ֗יךָ <S%H2687><s%> cha-tza-Tzei-cha, thine arrows יִתְהַלָּֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> yit-hal-La-chu. also went abroad

ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol The voice רַעַמְךָ֨׀ <S%H7482><s%> ra-'am-Cha of thy thunder בַּגַּלְגַּ֗ל <S%H1534><s%> bag-gal-Gal, [was] in the heaven הֵאִ֣ירוּ <S%H215><s%> he-'I-ru lightened בְרָקִ֣ים <S%H1300><s%> ve-ra-Kim the lightnings תֵּבֵ֑ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel; the world רָגְזָ֖ה <S%H7264><s%> ra-ge-Zah trembled וַתִּרְעַ֣שׁ <S%H7493><s%> vat-tir-'Ash and shook הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

בַּיָּ֤ם <S%H3220><s%> bai-Yam [is] in the sea דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ke-cha, Thy way; וּשְׁבִילֶיךָ u-she-vi-lei-cha כוּֽ֭שְׁבִֽילְךָ <S%H7635><s%> U-she-vi-le-cha path קבְּמַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> be-Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; in the great וְ֝עִקְּבוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H6119><s%> ve-'ik-ke-vo-Tei-cha, and thy footsteps לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not נֹדָֽעוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> no-Da-'u. are not known

נָחִ֣יתָ <S%H5148><s%> na-Chi-ta Thou leddest כַצֹּ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> chatz-Tzon like a flock עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha; thy people בְּֽיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron. and Aaron
